title: Armour/Highest bonuses

properties.name: description
properties.value: This page lists the items with the highest specific bonuses for each slot.

content:
The RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Maximum Bonuses in RuneScape Classic
See also: Armour/Lowest bonuses

This page lists the items with the highest specific bonuses for each slot.

Note that you can not directly compare weapons since they all have different speeds. For instance a weapon with a strength bonus of 50 and a speed of 4 should have a damage output roughly equal to a weapon with strength 75 and speed 6. In other words don't consider the weapons listed on this page to be "best" just because they have the highest bonuses, often that means these weapons are also very slow.

To compare weapons you should ideally use a DPS calculator, but a reasonable alternative is to use Calculator:Armoury and toggle Normalize.

Members[edit | edit source]

Attack bonuses[edit | edit source]

Stab[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Stab
bonus 		Notes
Fighter hat +5 Requires 45 to wear. Must also have 275 Honour points in each role from the Barbarian Assault minigame.
Amulet of torture +15 Requires 75 to wear.
Boots of brimstone +3 Requires 70 , 70 , 70 and 44 to wear.
Ardougne cloak 4 +6 Requires completion of the Elite Ardougne Diary.
Avernic defender +30 Requires a dragon defender and avernic defender hilt, 70 and 70 .
Ferocious gloves +16 Requires 80 and 80 to wear.
Treasonous ring (i) +8 The treasonous ring initially gives +4 stab bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via Soul Wars or the Nightmare Zone to double the ring's bonuses to +8.
Ghrazi rapier +94 Requires 75 to wield.
Zamorakian spear +85 Requires 70 to wield.
TOTAL +177 +138 if using a Zamorakian spear.

The tradeable items would cost 85,761,409 coins if using a Zamorakian spear, or 239,936,814 coins if using a Ghrazi rapier and an Avernic defender.

Slot Image Item Slash
bonus 		Notes
Warrior helm +5 Requires 45 and completion of The Fremennik Trials. The fighter hat from Barbarian Assault gives the same slash attack bonus, increases stab and crush attack, but has lower Defence bonuses.
Amulet of torture +15 Requires 75 to wear.
Primordial boots +2 Requires 75 and 75 to wear.
Infernal cape +4 Requires completion of the Inferno.
Avernic defender +29 Requires a dragon defender and avernic defender hilt, 70 and 70 .
Ferocious gloves +16 Requires 80 and 80 to wear.
Warrior ring (i) +8 The warrior ring initially gives +4 slash bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via Soul Wars or the Nightmare Zone to double the ring's bonuses to +8.
Blade of saeldor +94 Requires 75 to wield.
Godsword +132 All of the godswords provide the same slash attack bonus. Requires 75 to wield.
TOTAL +182 +173 if using a blade of Saeldor and an Avernic defender.

The tradeable items would cost 104,212,198 coins if using a Zamorak godsword, or 286,700,121 coins if using a blade of Saeldor and an Avernic defender.

bonus 		Notes

Magic[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Magic
bonus 		Notes
Ancestral hat +8 Requires 75 and 65 to wear, and gives +2% Magic damage. The 3rd age mage hat provides the same bonuses and only requires 65 and 30 to wear, but has no Melee Defence or Magic damage bonuses.
3rd age amulet +15 Requires 65 and 30 to wear. The amulet of fury, amulet of glory, and amulet of magic are all significantly cheaper in price, and give +10 Magic attack. The occult necklace provides not only +12 Magic attack, but also +10% Magic damage that stacks with other boosting effects.
Ancestral robe top +35 Requires 75 and 65 to wear, and gives +2% Magic damage.
Ancestral robe bottom +26 Requires 75 and 65 to wear, and gives +2% Magic damage.
Eternal boots +8 Requires 75 and 75 to wear.
Imbued god cape +15 Requires 75 and completion of Mage Arena II miniquest to be worn, and gives +2% Magic damage.
Arcane spirit shield +20 Requires 65 , 75 , and 70 to be worn. Mage's book is much cheaper and provides a bonus of +15.
Tormented bracelet +10 Requires 75 to wear, and gives +5% Magic damage.
Seers ring (i) +12 The seers ring initially gives +6 Magic bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via Soul Wars or the Nightmare Zone to double the ring's bonuses to +12.
Kodai wand +28 Requires 75 to wield, and gives +15% Magic damage.
TOTAL +177

The tradeable items would cost 512,971,234 coins if using a 3rd age amulet, or 481,775,339 coins if using an occult necklace.

Slot Image Item Ranged
bonus 		Notes
Armadyl helmet +10 Requires 70 and 70 to wear.
Necklace of anguish +15 Also gives +5 Ranged Strength. Requires 75 to use. An amulet of glory or an amulet of fury can be used as a cheaper alternative, but both only give +10 Ranged attack.
Armadyl chestplate +33 Requires 70 and 70 to wear.
Armadyl chainskirt +20 Requires 70 and 70 to wear.
Pegasian boots +12 Requires 75 and 75 to wear.
Ava's assembler +8 Requires completion of Dragon Slayer II, Vorkath's head and 70 to wear.
Twisted buckler +18 Requires 75 and 75 to wield.
Zaryte vambraces +18 Requires 80 and 45 to wear.
Archers ring (i) +8 The archers ring initially gives +4 Ranged bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via Soul Wars or the Nightmare Zone to double the ring's bonuses to +8.
Zaryte crossbow +110 Requires 80 to wield. Unlike other crossbows, the Zaryte crossbow grants defensive bonuses. It also has a passive effect that strengthens the effects of enchanted bolts by 10%.
Bow of faerdhinen +128 Requires completion of Song of the Elves alongside 75 and 70 to wield.
TOTAL +252 +252 if using a Zaryte crossbow and a twisted buckler.

The tradeable items would cost 512,110,015 coins if using a bow of faerdhinen, or 775,634,028 coins if using a Zaryte crossbow and a twisted buckler.

Other bonuses[edit | edit source]

Strength[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Strength
bonus 		Notes
Torva full helm +8 Requires 80 to wear. A Neitiznot faceguard gives +6 Strength bonus and requires The Fremennik Exiles completion and 70 . A helm of neitiznot gives +3, and requires the completion of The Fremennik Isles and 55 . A Berserker helm also gives +3, and requires only 45 and the completion of The Fremennik Trials. An obsidian helm also gives +3, requiring 60 only. A serpentine helm is the next best in slot providing +5 strength bonus.
Amulet of torture +10 Requires 75 to wear.
The Amulet of strength also gives +10, but lacks the +15 to stab, slash, and crush attack as well as +2 Prayer bonuses. However, the amulet of strength is significantly less expensive.
Torva platebody +6 Requires 80 to wear. A Bandos chestplate gives +4 Strength bonus and requires 65 to wear. A Fighter torso can be obtained through Barbarian Assault, which also gives a +4 bonus and requires only 40 .
Torva platelegs +4 Requires 80 to wear. Bandos tassets give +2 Strength bonus and require 65 to wear.
Primordial boots +5 Requires 75 and 75 to wear.
Infernal cape +8 Requires completion of the Inferno. Fire cape gives +4 but is significantly easier to obtain.
Avernic defender +8 Requires 70 and 70 to wield.
Ferocious gloves +14 Requires 80 and 80 to wear.
Berserker ring (i) +8 The berserker ring initially gives +4 Strength bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via Soul Wars or the Nightmare Zone to double the ring's bonuses to +8.
Leaf-bladed battleaxe +92 Requires 65 and 55 to wield.
Elder maul +147 Requires 75 and 75 to wield.
TOTAL +210 +163 if using the Leaf-bladed battleaxe and Avernic defender.

The tradeable items would cost 1,194,352,626 coins if using an elder maul, or 1,221,066,394 coins if using a leaf-bladed battleaxe and an Avernic defender.

Ranged strength[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Ranged strength
bonus 		Notes
Necklace of anguish +5 Requires 75 to wear.
Ava's assembler +2 Requires 70 to wear, and the completion of Dragon Slayer II and Vorkath's head to make.
Zaryte vambraces +2 Requires 80 and 45 to wear.
Dragon javelin +150 Can only be used with ballistae.
Heavy ballista +15 Requires 75 and the completion of Monkey Madness II to wield.
Onyx dragon bolts (e) +122 Highest strength bonus for ammo used by one-handed weapons is +122 for any dragon bolts, used by crossbows above rune.
Black chinchompa +30 Requires 65 to wield.
Twisted buckler +10 Requires 75 and 75 to wield. Can be used with any one-handed ranged weapon, such as chinchompas and crossbows.
TOTAL +174 +49 if using black chinchompas, +141 if using a crossbow with dragon bolts.

Excluding ammo, the tradeable items would cost 220,885,871 coins if using a heavy ballista, or 236,076,183 coins if using a twisted buckler with chinchompas or a crossbow.

Magic damage[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Strength
bonus 		Notes
Ancestral hat +2% Requires 75 and 65 to wear.
Occult necklace +10% Requires 70 to wear.
Ancestral robe top +2% Requires 75 and 65 to wear.
Ancestral robe bottom +2% Requires 75 and 65 to wear.
Imbued god cape +2% Requires 75 and the completion of Mage Arena II to wear.
Tormented bracelet +5% Requires 75 to wear.
Kodai wand +15% Requires 75 to wield. Staff of the dead and its toxic variant also provide +15% magic damage, but with lower accuracy, lower chance to save runes, inability to autocast Ancient Magicks, and not providing infinite water runes.
TOTAL +38%

The tradeable items would cost 301,514,212 coins.

Prayer[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Prayer
bonus 		Notes
Any mitre +5 Requires 40 and 40 to be worn.
Dragonbone necklace +12 Requires 70 to wear. The Bonecrusher necklace has the same bonus, requirements, and prayer-restoring effect, but also acts as a Bonecrusher.
Proselyte hauberk +8 Requires 30 and 20 to be worn. The completion of The Slug Menace is also required. The 3rd age druidic robe top also gives +8 prayer bonus but it requires 65 to be worn and doesn't offer any other bonuses besides prayer.
Proselyte cuisse +6 Requires 30 and 20 to be worn. The completion of The Slug Menace is also required. The Proselyte tasset can also be used. The zealot's robe bottom or 3rd age druidic robe bottoms also give +6 prayer bonus but don't offer any other bonuses besides prayer, though they also don't negatively affect range and magic accuracy. The 3rd age druidic robe bottoms also require 65 to be worn.
Devout boots +5 Requires 60 to wear.
Soul cape +8 Requires 70 to wear, and 2,500 Zeal Tokens from the Soul Wars Minigame to purchase.
Any god book +5 Requires completion of Horror from the Deep. Broodoo shields also give the same bonus, but require 25 and 25 .
The Falador shield 4 gives the same Prayer bonus and requires completion of the Elite Falador Diary.
Holy wraps +3 Requires 31 to wear. Cheaper alternatives include White gloves and Blessed vambraces, but they only give +1 to Prayer. A Tormented bracelet gives +2, but requires 75 to wear.
Ring of the gods (i) +8 The ring of the gods initially gives +4 Prayer bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via Soul Wars or the Nightmare Zone to increase its Prayer bonuses to +8. The Ring of suffering (i) gives +4 Prayer and has significantly higher Defence bonuses, but does not give the Holy wrench effect and additionally requires 75 .
Any crozier +6 Requires 60 to wield. The Void knight mace also gives the same Prayer bonus, but requires 42 , , , , , , and 22 . The 3rd age druidic staff also gives +6 prayer bonus but it requires 65 and 65 to wield.
Rada's blessing 4 +2 Requires completion of the elite Kourend & Kebos Diary.
TOTAL +68

The tradeable items would cost 28,270,462 coins if using a Saradomin mitre, crozier, and god book.

Slot Image Item Weight
reduction 		Notes
Graceful hood -3 Costs 35 Marks of grace.
Spottier cape -4.5 Requires 66 to be worn.
Graceful top -5 Costs 55 Marks of grace.
Graceful legs -6 Costs 60 Marks of grace.
Penance gloves -4.5 Costs 150 Honour points in each role from the Barbarian Assault minigame.
Boots of lightness -4.5 Found during the Temple of Ikov quest. Can obtain more by returning to the dungeon near the Legends Guild.
TOTAL -27.5 -25kg if using the entire graceful outfit. The outfit also provides additional run energy restoration per piece worn.

Valuing marks of grace by the current cost of amylase crystals, the tradeable items would cost 1,662,156 coins if using the lightest equipment, or 2,879,856 coins if using the entire graceful outfit.
